testcase.classname: feature to test ebay test functionality
testcase.name: To validate user is bale to login or not
testcase.system-out: Given Browser should be open................................................passed And user should be on ebay home page........................................passed And user navigate to login page.............................................passed When user enters the valid email address....................................passed And user enters the valid password..........................................passed When user clicks on login button............................................passed Then login must be successful...............................................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test ebay test functionality
testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to navigate to purchase history page
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on ebay homepage.......................................passed And user is able to see my ebay option......................................passed When user should click on purchase history option...........................passed Then user should be navigated to purchase history page......................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test ebay test functionality
testcase.name: To validate the search option in purchase history orders is enabled.
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on purchase history page...............................passed And user is able to see search option in orders.............................passed When user enter the product name in search box..............................passed And hits the search button..................................................passed Then user is able to see the search result..................................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test ebay test functionality
testcase.name: To validate user is able to navigate to cancel detail page after clicking
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on order details.......................................passed And See cancel details option is visible....................................passed When User click on See cancel details option................................passed Then User is redirected to cancel details page..............................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test ebay test functionality
testcase.name: To validate user is able to navigate to the seller other items page after
testcase.system-out: Given User Should be on Cancel items........................................passed And User is able to see views seller's other item option....................passed When User click on View seller's other item option..........................passed Then User is redirected to other item option page...........................passed
